alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Cuming; Madison; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:52PM CDT until May 12 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Northern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 551 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Genoa to 2 miles east of Columbus, moving northeast at 60 mph. A tornado warning is also in effect for portions of Platte and Colfax counties. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Platte Center around 605 PM CDT. Humphrey and Clarkson around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Howells, Creston and Madison. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
